import React,{useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import {Form,FormGroup,ListGroup , ListGroupItem, Button} from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const [credentials, setCrederials] = useState({ user: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName: '', phone:'', guestSize: 1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange = e=>{ setCrederials(prev =>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; // send data to the server const handleClick = e =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(credentials); } const guestNumber = Number(credentials.guestSize); const serviceFee = 10; const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee); return ( <>

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* ==============booking form start====================*/}
Information
{/* ==============booking form end====================*/} {/*===============start of booking bottom =====================*/}
${price} {guestNumber} person
${guestNumber*price}
Service charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
{/*===============end of booking bottom=====================*/}
) } export default Booking
